title: saying "gg ez" made me get perma banned
body:
so i played this soraka game i went 2/0/27.
when the game ended i said gg ez.
next day i opened my account and its perma banned.
not gonna bother mentioning how much money and time i spent on that account.

replies.body:
Since bringing threads back from the dead is akin to spamming and against the rules, I'm going to have to go ahead and lock this one by sending it into the realm of darkness for voidlings to feast upon. If you'd like to discuss this topic, I recommend creating a new thread and presenting your points there! ðŸ”’

If you have any questions or concerns about this action, please visit us in the Moderation Discord [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).

No. You didn't say ggez in the game you were penalized for at all.

You called people idiots, autistic, and feeders along with telling people to kill themselves and to fuck themselves.

Additionally you've already been warned numerous times.

You have an intentional feeder ban and a chat restriction before this.

post the chat logs my dude

> [{quoted}](name=CamilleRule34,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cBfF2qVH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-27T22:53:21.800+0000)

http://prntscr.com/hg3tlv

You messed up the edit dude. The text you edited is clearly better quality than the rest, and the name is slightly skewed to the right. You also included a space after your username which they don't do on the real ones.

But what I find more amazing than you actually making this, is that you tried to actually convince us of something false in a poor attempt to get unbanned. We can't do anything, and anyone who could would just look up your actual chatlogs. 

Overall a 5/10 troll.

1 for default
+ 7 points for actually taking time to photoshop an image together
- 3 point for the low effort of said image :/

first off im not trying to get unbanned, i quitted league and i dont really want to play it anymore even if i get unbanned and the space is og and u can check ppl that are recently banned also u can have ur custom font in the client by editing the swf. file

> u can have ur custom font in the client by editing the swf. file

The client doesn't have swf files.

This gets better each time he comments and you reply

https://i.imgur.com/mOWxpIA.png
oof

... swf standsfor ShockWaveFlash.... its a file used by adobe...on websites...
The Legacy client was built with Adobe Air, wasn't it? A year ago, he might have gotten away with this claim.
It's not even the same account, holy shit. This thread gets better with each Tantram comment.

Wait, you got another account banned this week .. in addition to the one you're posting from?

Login to that account and post from it. There's no way you would be banned for just saying ggez.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cBfF2qVH,comment-id=000000000002,timestamp=2017-11-27T23:57:08.956+0000)

It has been used to post in the boards:

game was in fact easy, should i lie to the enemy team and say it was hard?
since this is your ideology i will not believe anything you say, because you think that one have to lie!
i dont believe when u said that gg ez is negative and immature, i can't trust you sorry liar.

> [{quoted}](name=xhydn,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cBfF2qVH,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-11-27T23:41:58.492+0000)

The game  could have been  easy   the fact that you stated it  is what is in question .... even if they game was  easy it was immature  uncivilized unsportsmanlike to actually state that.

sooo all you did was prove  again how immature uncivilized  negitive person and  player you are with that response.

and  again prove that a fail troll once again failed.
And people say riots system doesnt work. Smh.
At this point I'm halfway convinced that the dude got banned, and decided *welp, lemme give the community a bloody good time on my way out the door as penance*, and proceeded to start this thread.
The hero we deserve
Good.

I always report people for saying "gg ez" You are making the loss feel even worse for your opponents. It might even get to the point where your toxicity causes a player to quit the game and not invest more money into ingame content which means less money for Riot.

Dont shit on your opponents just because you had a good game. I see that sentence so often that i would hope Riot added an automatic queque timeout to players that types it.

Deserved Ban 
https://images.gr-assets.com/hostedimages/1380985240ra/3681055.gif
{{summoner:11}}

And you just showed us, that you belong to his kind also... Well played my sir. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

https://matchhistory.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/EUW1/231001211

Last game you played was Teemo... Even your last few Soraka games aren't 2/0/27. You had a 0/5/27 tho.... could your memory be mistaken? Not only about your game but also about what you said?

My son asked me the other day to use my account because his got banned for saying the same thing. I couldn't believe rito would ban for saying GGEZ so I logged into his account and read his chat log. He must have spammed about a hundred messages in the last 3 minutes of the game calling everyone racist and homophobe names and telling everyone to kill themselves. I'm glad he got banned for the 15 days and I tacked on an extra 15 for good measure. Thanks for co-parenting rito!
